document_data.name: Traveler's Cloak Inn
document_data.inhabitants: Inhabitants of the Traveler's Cloak Inn
document_data.organizations: Organizations in the Traveler's Cloak Inn
document_data.mainbody: '''Traveler's Cloak Inn''' was an inn in [[Mulmaster]] on the [[Moonsea]].
document_data.Structure: The inn was a welcoming establishment where each room had a fireplace.
document_data.Staff: The Traveler's Cloak was run by [[Dela Alder|Dela]] and [[Vesvur Alder]].
document_data.Activities: Vesvur was a [[Harper]] agent who reported to [[Chesslyn Onaubra]].
document_data.Prices:
*Room, dinner, and drink sold for 12 gp per night.
*Stabling of mounts for 3 gp per night.
